3: Even with the roaring engine from the main building...
...I can still hear your every move.
(Turns and draws her bow) You've come so far already. About time we meet face-to-face, don't you think?
No wonder you were taking turns and vaulting over walls... I've been noticed all this time...
I'm not going to say something cliche like 'we meet again' this time around.
Why are you following me? Trying to ambush the Purifying Force again?
I have my reason to be here.
If your 'reason' is to take down my team, then I can't let you leave here alive.
Do you think you can stop me?
Listen—I'm here today for something more than taking down the Purifying Force. I've been following you so that I can achieve what I'm here for.
If you care about your team, then let them know—let all of Nikola's minions know...
So... you've decided to withhold the truth...
